titles.title: National Defense Cybersecurity Consortia Act of 2019
To establish a consortia of universities to advise the Secretary of Defense on cybersecurity matters, and for other purposes.
National Defense Cybersecurity Consortia Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Intelligence and Emerging Threats and Capabilities.

bill.summary:
National Defense Cybersecurity Consortia Act of 2019
This bill requires the Department of Defense (DOD) to establish one or more consortia, comprising certain universities, to advise and assist on matters relating to cybersecurity. DOD must establish procedures for organizations within DOD to access such expertise.
